sourcesContent:
import react from 'react' import './styles.scss' interface instruction { level: number } const Instruction = ({ level } : instruction) => { let normal_min = Math.floor(3 * level) let normal_max = Math.floor(5 * level) let special_min = Math.floor(10 * level) let special_max = Math.floor(15 * level) return(
ataque normal
{normal_min} - {normal_max}
regain
{ Math.floor(15 * level )}
quittez le jeux
fire ball
{special_min} - {special_max}
X
fire wall
{level}/s
⚠ firewall garder la touche enfonce
) } export default Instruction
